basics.name: Nam Nguy
basics.label: High-achieving and self-directed with strong academic credentials and hands-on mechanical experience. Solid knowledge of machine building, designing, and operating. Noted for strong leadership, team cooperation, and project management skills.

work.company: Dai Loc Phat, Inc. , Hochiminh City, Vietnam
work.desc:
* Learned how to examine issues & fix products, such as misted fans, portable air conditioners
* Supported customers with machine problems

work.company: Thien Phat Shopping Center, Angiang, Vietnam
work.desc:
* Manage and motivate employees to increase sales and ensure efficiency 
* Respond to customer complaints and comments
* Analyze sales figures and forecasted future sales volumes to oversee pricing and stock control
* Determine marketing strategy changes, and implement strategies to meet long and short term goals
